roleset.name: think of

example.name: oddly transitive
example.text: Market segmentation in cars isn't new, but it's far more extensive than when Alfred P. Sloan Jr. conceived the idea 50 years ago.

example.name: more typically prepositional
example.text: Try as they might, they just can't conceive of life without black workers.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: [The restaurant]-1 was conceived *trace*-1 as a sparkling, crystalline ``geode.''

roleset.note: Frames file for 'conceive' based on wsj; nominal 'conception' based on BOLT-7. No VNcls.

example.name: nominal rel: conception
example.text: Related reasons have already been offered in my papers " Discussion on the Unification of China by Republicanism " , " Conception of Republican Unification and Rejuvenation by the Four Principles of Zhou Enlai " , [...] and " Taiwan Is One ' Aspect ' of China 's Politics " so I will not repeat it here .
example.arg: by the Four Principles of Zhou Enlai

example.name: intransitive
example.text: [Some women]-1 clearly have no trouble *trace*-1 eventually conceiving again: The studies have reported repeaters in their programs.

example.name: with child mentioned
example.text: Perhaps, the psychological barriers that *T*-1 had prevented her-2 from*PRO*-2 conceiving Hal's child would no longer be present.
